title: While We Are Young (song)
text:
"While We Are Young" is a collaboration single of Filipino singer-songwriter Keiko Necesario and Filipino rapper <a href="Quest%20%28singer%29">Quest</a>. The track was originally released on 30 June 2017 as part of Keiko Necesario's sophomore album "Escape" and has surpassed 800,000 streams on <a href="Spotify">Spotify</a> from the day of its release. It was re-released on 1 August 2018 by Stages Sessions, as part of the official motion picture soundtrack of the film "Ang Babaeng Allergic Sa Wifi".
Composition and lyrics.
"While We Are Young" runs for a total of three minutes and fifty-one seconds. The song is set in <a href="Time%20signature">common time</a> with a <a href="tempo">tempo</a> of 116 <a href="beats%20per%20minute">beats per minute</a> and written in the <a href="key%20%28music%29">key</a> of <a href="D%20major">D major</a>. The lyrics were written in <a href="English%20language">English</a> by Keiko Necesario and the <a href="Rapping">rap parts</a> by <a href="Quest%20%28singer%29">Quest</a>.
<a href="DWNU">Wish 107.5</a> described "While We Are Young" as "an electro-folk pop track [that] is an ode to taking chances, rising above frustrations, and chasing after one’s biggest dreams".
Reception.
<a href="DWNU">Wish 107.5</a> expressed that "While We Are Young [as] glowing with perkiness and vigor [that] should definitely sit on the top your summer playlist".
Promotion.
Live performances.
On 29 July 2018, Keiko performed "While We Are Young" on <a href="Penshoppe">Penshoppe Fancon Crowd</a>.
Radio.
On 18 August 2017, Keiko and Quest performed the song on <a href="DWNU">Wish 107.5 Bus</a>.
Credits and personnel.
Credits adapted from <a href="YouTube">YouTube</a>:
BGYO version.
"While We Are Young" is the first revival single by the Filipino boy group <a href="BGYO">BGYO</a>. The official track was released on 18 June 2021 as a Digital Single by <a href="Star%20Music">Star Music</a>. It was produced as part of the 4th Season of <a href="Coke%20Studio%20Philippines">Coke Studio Philippines' Itodo Mo Beat Mo</a>.
Composition.
BGYO's version of "While We Are Young" runs for a total of four minutes. The song is set in <a href="Time%20signature">common time</a> with a <a href="tempo">tempo</a> of 120 <a href="beats%20per%20minute">beats per minute</a> and written in the <a href="key%20%28music%29">key</a> of <a href="F-sharp%20minor">F♯</a>/<a href="G-flat%20minor">G♭</a> <a href="Minor%20scale">minor</a>.
Background and release.
BGYO's version of "While We Are Young" was first revealed in the first episode of <a href="Coke%20Studio%20Philippines">Coke Studio Philippines' Itodo Mo Beat Mo</a> on 17 May 2021. On 18 June 2021, the track was officially released as a single via <a href="music%20download">digital download</a> accompanied by a lyric video uploaded by <a href="Star%20Music">Star Music</a> on YouTube.
Reception.
Arambulo Live shared "BGYO made sure to put their own spin on the cover by speeding up the track a bit and including awesome dance moves!"
